MUSIC STORE 


 The library that can be used for payments is called STRIPE. 
 We can install this library by adding following line to build.gradle: "compile 'com.stripe:stripe-android:4.1.1'". 
 The lib can be used to store credit card details of our customers. CardInputWidget need to be used. 
 Next step is to transfer those card infos safely to STRIPE. This can be done by tokens. 
 Using token required Http post from onActivityResult method (for Android Pay) or the onSuccess callback (when using your own form).

ABOUT ARTIST 


 HERE WILL BE SOME ARTIST HISTORY, GENERAL INFO ETC

ALBUMS 


 Here will be the information about album. Genre, artists, designer of the cover, etc etc

Here is the place to put a list of tracks available on this specific album, their duration, special guests etc.\n The necessary info will be taken froom official artist site. The list could be store in ArrayList of Object "Track". \n This Track would be a java class that contains String as a title, int as duration and second string with additional info.

NOW PLAYING 

 This is the main activity of music app. On this screen you can play music using buttons below. 
 There is a button to previous song, next song and play/pause. 
 From this screen you can switch to another screens like: album details, artist page and store.
